Aldrin Davis (amụrụ n'August 2, 1969), nke a maara dị ka DJ Toomp, bụ ónyé America na-emepụta ihe ndekọ, ónyé na-ede egwu, na DJ

DJ Toomp malitere na 1985, ya na Atlanta MC Raheem the Dream, na-emepụta ihe ndekọ aha ya mgbè ọ dị naanị afọ iri na isii. Na ngwụcha afọ 1980, ọ bụ MC Shy-D's DJ ma soro ya na 2 Live Crew mee njem, ka ha na-eme ihe n'ebe dị iche iche gafee mba ahụ na ihe omume hip hop ndị ọzọ dị ka N.W.A
Mgbe MC Shy'D hapụrụ Luke Records, Toomp gárá DJ maka JT Money na Poison Clan
Mgbe 2 Live Crew kewara, ya na ónyé bụbu ónyé otu Brother Marquis, nke a na-akpọ Indecent Exposure, rụrụ ọrụ na abọm, n'okpuru aha 2 Nazty; mkpuchi ahụ kwuru na ọ bụ ónyé otu Poison Clan
N'afọ 2006, Toomp sonyeere ónyé agha hip hop Bernard Parks, Jr., iji malite NZone Entertainment, ákàrà ndekọ nke ha.
DJ Toomp malitere inweta nkwado ka ukwuu site n'ịrụ ọrụ na onye na-eti egwu ndịda T.I., ónyé sikwa Atlanta, Georgia
Ha bu ụzọ rụkọọ ọrụ ọnụ na T.I

nke mbụ na 2001 I'm Serious, ébé ọ bụ na ha abụọ wuru ọbụbụenyi na mmekọrịta ọrụ, ya na ya ghọrọ ónyé isi na-emepụta T.I.' Toomp tinyere aka nke ukwuu na abọm anọ mbụ nke T.I.; ha abụọ wetara egwu ọnyà n'ime ndị isi
Toomp wee nweta otuto dị egwu na 2006, màkà ịmepụta egwu egwu T.I

"What You Know", nke ruru n'ọkwa # 3 na US Billboard Hot 100, egwu ahụ nwetara ma Toomp na T.I., Grammy Award mbụ ha. N'afọ 2007, ónyé America na-eti egwu na ónyé na-emepụta ihe ndekọ Kanye West kpọrọ DJ Toomp, iji nye aka na mmepụta na abọm nke atọ ya bụ Graduation
Toomp, n'akụkụ West, jikọtara aka mepụta egwu "Can't Tell Me Nothing" na "Good Life", yana album nke ọzọ "Big Brother", ode màkà ọbụbụenyi nwanne West na onye America rapper Jay-Z.
